data.content:
noun
US or Brit snowplough , pl -plows
[count] a flat or curved piece of metal that is attached to the front of a vehicle and used for clearing snow from a road, driveway, etc. also; :a vehicle (such as a truck) that has a snowplow attached - see picture at plow
a position in skiing in which the front ends of the skis are moved together in order to stop, slow down, or turn - often used before another noun
a snowplow turn/stop
verb
US or Brit snowplough -plows; -plowed; -plowing
[no obj] :to move the front ends of your skis together in order to stop, slow down, or turn
He snowplowed to a stop.

Danh từ
(Mỹ)
như snowplough
xem snowplough
